raw_body: AL HAJ MOHAMED MUBASHIR SALIE – (Chairman of W.M.M. Salie & Company,​ Galle). Devoted husband of Hajara Salie,​ loving father of Akyes,​ Zayan,​ Eenaz & Sabreen,​ caring father-in-law of Dilshani,​ Dr Shemoon Marleen,​ Inasha Mahir & Zahid Fuard,​ cherished grandfather of Ashika,​ Afraz,​ Izak,​ Aleeza,​ Zaik & Liyana. Janaza took place yesterday (Monday) 4th March 2024 at Osanagoda Burial Ground in Galle. 134/​2,​ Colombo Road,​ Galle. Eenaz Salie – +0777373777.      015746
